description: Purchase, delivery and installation of office chairs.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Office Seating

## General Information

* **Tender Title:** Office Seating under Supply Arrangement (SA) – Bedford Row Phase II, Halifax, Nova Scotia
* **Reference Number:** WS4534578836-Doc4534664924
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Publication Date:** April 17, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 24, 2024, 2:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 30, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

## Bidder Information

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** None

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **End User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entities Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

## Description of Requirement

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating to Halifax, Nova Scotia, Atlantic Region by October 15, 2024. This request is a set-aside procurement under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and is exempt from international trade agreements.

## Pre-Qualification Requirements

Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement are eligible to bid. Suppliers who are not pre-qualified but wish to participate must submit a bid and supply arrangement documents.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Cyr, Maryse (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19431961?extsite=MTk0MzE5
